questions.question_text: Application servers require load balancing and security services. Where in the data center network should these services be provisioned?

choices.E: Apply two-way redistribution at each location with a route filter at each location
choices.B: Apply one-way redistribution exclusively at each location
choices.F: Apply EIGRP with the same autonomous system throughout both networks E
choices.D: Apply two-way redistribution at each location with a route filter at only one location
choices.C: Apply two-way redistribution exclusively at each location

questions.question_text: Your company's Cisco routers are operating with EIGRP. You need to join networks with an acquisition's heterogeneous routers at 3 sites, operating with EIGRP and OSPF. Which describes the best practice for routing protocol deployment?

discussion.content: E. Apply two-way redistribution at each location with a route filter at each location

questions.answer_description:
Without filters there is possibility of routing loops.
Link: http://www.cisco.com/en/US/tech/tk365/technologies_tech_note09186a008009487e.shtml

questions.question_text: A network engineer is tasked to upgrade and expand a large existing production network. From the IOS CLI, what two protocols can be used to build a topology map of the existing network? (Choose two.)

discussion.content:
LLDP and Traceroute is the correct Answer
D and E
Please fix the format of this question

The controller supports four QoS levels:

Platinum/Voice—Ensures a high quality of service for voice over wireless.

Gold/Video—Supports high-quality video applications.

Silver/Best Effort—Supports normal bandwidth for clients. This is the default setting.

Bronze/Background—Provides the lowest bandwidth for guest services.

questions.question_text: Which three QoS levels should VoIP clients be set to on a Cisco WLC? (Choose three.)
